1  var Phaser = require('phaser');
2  
3  
4
¶

Here is a custom game object

 
4  
5  function Player(game) {
6    console.debug("creating a Player!", game);
7  
8    Phaser.Sprite.call(this, game, 50, 50, 'game_sprites');
9  
10    game.add.existing(this);
11  
12    game.physics.enable(this, Phaser.Physics.ARCADE);
13    this.body.gravity.y = 1000;
14  
15  }
16  
17  Player.prototype = Object.create(Phaser.Sprite.prototype);
18  Player.prototype.constructor = Player;
19  
20  
21  Player.prototype.jump = function () {
22    console.log("JUMP!");
23    this.player.body.velocity.y = -350;
24  };
25  
26  
27  
28  module.exports = Player;
29
